title: Randy Crawford - Windsong (1982) [EAC-FLAC]
description:
Randy Crawford - Windsong (1982)
                EAC rip (secure mode) | FLAC (tracks)+CUE+LOG -> 250
                           Full Artwork @ 300 dpi (jpg) 



Another strong album for Randy Crawford; the song "Imagine" remains one of the best R&B covers/versions around, while "One Hello" did well in Europe and made it to the charts, as did "Imagine," although it broke later in America. Crawford sang with consistency and character on every number.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

06. One Hello 
07. Windsong 
08. When I'm Gone 
09. Don't Come Knockin' 
10. I Don't Want To Lose Him 
11. We Had A Love So Strong 

*2014 Warner/Fusion Collection 7599-23687-2
